com.karuslabs.commons.menu

Class Menu<GenericInventory extends org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karuslabs.commons.menu.Menu<GenericInventory>
  • Type Parameters:
    GenericInventory - A inventory type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder

    public class Menu<GenericInventory extends org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory>
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
    Represents a graphical item menu.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Consumer<org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity> REMOVE
      Consumer which unbinds the menu from the player in MenuPool when the menu is closed.
